SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(
ORDER BY D.DISNAME ASC
ORDER BY D.DISNAME DESC
ORDER BY D.DISNO ASC
ORDER BY D.DISNO DESC
ORDER BY D.DISNO DESC
) AS RNUM, D.DISNO, D.PETTYPEID, D.DISNAME, D.DEFINITION, D.CAUSE, D.SYMPTOM, D.TREATMENT, D.TIP, D.CREATEDAT, D.UPDATEDAT FROM PETDISEASE D JOIN PETTYPE P ON D.PETTYPEID=P.PETTYPEID )A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
